item.title: Conferimento di 3 borse di studio di dottorato in Scienza e Teoria dei Dati finanziate da Human Technopole / Selection for the conferment of three PhD fellowships in Theoretical and Scientific Data Science financed by Human Technopole
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Roberto Trotta (SISSA) Prof. Guido Sanguinetti (SISSA) Prof. Andrea Sottoriva (HT)

From: 04-01-2023 13:00
To: 17-02-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Conferimento di 3 borse di studio di dottorato in Scienza e Teoria dei Dati finanziate da Human Technopole


Selection for the conferment of 3 PhD fellowships in Theoretical and Scientific Data Science financed by Human Technopole.


Topics:

Predicting the evolution of cancer;

Predictingantibiotic resistance evolution in microbial communities

New machine learning methods for single cell multi-omic data;

Modeling mulitiomic states of brain cells in evolution, development, and disease.


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale / Academic qualifications,"remote" written test and interview

item.title: Conferimento di una borsa di studio di dottorato su Hydrogen-bond Networks as Optical Probes (HyBOP) finanziata da ERC (ICTP)
item.description:
Selection for the conferment of one PhD fellowships on Hydrogen-bond Networks as Optical Probes (HyBOP) financed by ERC (ICTP) - Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Cristian Micheletti (SISSA) Prof. Ali Hassanali (ICTP)

From: 29-12-2022 13:00
To: 20-03-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Conferimento di una borsa di studio di dottorato su Hydrogen-bond Networks as Optical Probes (HyBOP) finanziata da ERC (ICTP) 


Selection for the conferment of one PhD fellowships on Hydrogen-bond Networks as Optical Probes (HyBOP) financed by ERC (ICTP)


Amount of the fellowship:    €  1.400,00 net per month (such amount includes a contribution towards rent expenses and does not foresee social security coverage – see below)
Financing Body:    International Centre for Theoretical Physics (ICTP) though European Research Council (ERC) Project on Hydrogen-bond Networks as Optical Probes.
Duration of the programme:    4 years


Selection Process: Academic qualifications,"remote" written test and interview - 3 - 5 April


Other benefits: Selection for the conferment of ERC Funded PhD Fellowship on Hydrogen-bond Networks as Optical Probes (HyBOP) | Scuola Internazionale Superiore di Studi Avanzati (sissa.it)

item.title: Concorso per titoli ed esami per l’ammissione al corso di Philosophiae Doctor (Ph.D.) in Scienza e Teoria dei Dati - PNRR - Missione 4, Componente 2, Investimento 1.3 - PE00000013 - FAIR: Future Artificial Intelligence Research
item.description:
Selection for the conferment of one PhD fellowships in Theoretical and Scientific Data Science financed by PNRR-FAIR

From: 20-01-2023 13:00
To: 17-02-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Concorso per titoli ed esami per l’ammissione al corso di Philosophiae Doctor (Ph.D.) in Scienza e Teoria dei Dati nell’ambito del Piano Nazionale di Ripresa e Resilienza - Missione 4, Componente 2, Investimento 1.3 - PE00000013 - FAIR: Future Artificial Intelligence Research


Topics:


  • Bayesian methods and machine learning

  • Theory and applications of neural networks

  • Information theory

  • Unsupervised segmentation of high-dimensional data

  • Statistical modelling of biomedical data and bioinformatics

  • Cosmological and astrophysical data analysis and model selection

  • Applications of data science to statistical mechanics, neurosciences, and condensed matter physics

  • Machine learning applied to Oncology

Durata: 4 anni

Duration: 4 years


Modalità di selezione: Titoli  - scritto - orale (06.03; 16-17.03.2023)

 Selection Process:  Academic qualifications - written - oral (06.03; 16-17.03.2023)

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Analisi Matematica, Modelli e Applicazioni / Selection for the admission to the Mathematical Analysis, Modelling, and Applications PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Massimiliano Berti

From: 28-12-2022 13:00
To: 04-02-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Research topics

• Conservation Laws

• Transport Problems

• Geometric PDEs

• Numerical Analysis of PDEs

• Nonlinear Analysis

• Dynamical Systems

• Hamiltonian and dispersive PDEs

• Calculus of Variations

• Gamma-Convergence and Multiscale Analysis

• Rate independent evolution problems

• Geometric Control Theory

• Sub-Riemannian Geometry

• Inelastic behavior of solids: plasticity, damage, fracture

• Mechanobiology of the cell and cell motility

• Mechanics of soft and active materials  

• Reduced basis methods

• Boundary integral methods and isogeometric analysis  

• Fluid-structure interaction problems

• Computational Fluid and Solid Mechanics

• Uncertainty quantification

• Shape optimization

• Flow control

• Machine Learning 


Announcement: https://www.sissa.it/bandi/ammissione-ai-corsi-di-phd-della-sissa-lanno-accademico-202324-admission-sissa-phd-courses

Available positions: 8

Fellowship amount: approx. €16.242,96 gross per year (approx. € 1.200,00 net per month)

Duration: 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale / Academic qualifications - written - oral (14-15 February 2023)

Topics:


Physical Cosmology

Galaxy Formation and Evolution

Stellar Structure and Evolution

Gravitational Waves and Gravity Theory

Dark Matter and Dark Energy

Multimessenger Astrophysics 

Galaxy Clusters and Large Scale Structures

Astrochemistry and Astrobiology

Analysis of Astrophysical and Cosmological Datasets

Computational Astrophysics


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - prova orale

Academic qualifications - interview (04 - 05.04.2022)

Candidates can choose whether they wish to attend in person or remotely

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Teoria e Simulazione Numerica degli Stati Condensati Selection for the admission to the Theory and Numerical Simulation of the Condensed Matter PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Giuseppe Santoro

From: 10-01-2023 13:00
To: 07-03-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Teoria e Simulazione Numerica degli Stati Condensati

Selection for the admission to the Theory and Numerical Simulation of the Condensed Matter PhD course


Topics:


Non-equilibrium dynamics of correlated systems

Theoretical Quantum Technologies

Methods for many-body quantum systems: Tensor Networks, DMFT

Mott Physics and topology from solids to heterostructures

High-temperature superconductivity and strong correlations

Optical and excited-state properties of complex molecular systems

Theory and simulation of thermal transport in liquid and amorphous systems

Relativistic effects in materials

Validation of pseudopotentials for high throughput applications

Beyond DFT: RPA and WdWDF

Electronic simulation of realistic systems by advanced many-body techniques

Software engineering and the Quantum ESPRESSO project


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale / Academic qualifications - written - oral (20.03 - 24.03.2023)

To: 31-03-2023 13:00

Topics:


  • Intelligence, personality & cognitive reserve

  • Neuronal bases of Visual perception

  • Neuronal bases of Time perception

  • Neuronal bases of Tactile perception

  • Language, reading, and statistical learning

  • Neural computation approaches to memory and brain organization

  • Computational bases of perception and cognition

Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - scritto - orale (da remoto) / Academic qualifications - written - interview (remotely)
Written: 20.04 - 21.04.2023

Interview: 02.05.2023

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Fisica Matematica e Geometria / Selection for the admission to the Geometry and Mathematical Physics PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Ugo Bruzzo

From: 28-12-2022 13:00
To: 01-02-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Research Topics:


• Integrable systems in relation with differential, algebraic and symplectic geometry, as well as with the theory of random matrices, special functions and nonlinear waves, Frobenius manifolds.

• Geometry of moduli spaces of sheaves and of curves, their deformation theory and virtual classes also in relation with supersymmetric gauge theories, strings, Gromov-Witten invariants, orbifolds and automorphisms.

• Quantum groups, noncommutative Riemannian and spin geometry, applications to models in mathematical physics.

• Mathematical methods of quantum mechanics.

• Mathematical aspects of quantum Field Theory and String Theory.

• Symplectic geometry, sub-riemannian geometry, stochastic geometry, real algebraic geometry.

• Geometry of quantum fields and strings.

• Complex differential geometry.

• Generalized complex geometry.


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - orale (da remoto)

Academic qualifications - interview (remotely)

(13.02 - 17.02.2023)

Topics:


- Functional genomics

- Cerebral cortex development

- Prion biology

- Computational genomics

- Neurodevelopmental and neurodegenerative disorders

- Bioinformatics

- Neurogenomics

- Structural biology

- Molecular and cellular biology

- Evolutionary and comparative genomics

- Drug discovery

- Invertebrates neurogenetics

- Epitranscriptomic modulation of CNS development and function

- Aging


Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli - orale (da remoto) / Academic qualifications - interview (remotely) (29.05 - 30.05.2023)

item.title: Bando per l'ammissione al dottorato di ricerca Joint International ICTP/SISSA Ph.D (JIISP) Programme in Physics and Mathematics
item.description:
From: 28-12-2022 13:00
To: 15-02-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Selection for the admissione to the Joint International ICTP/SISSA Ph.D (JIISP) Programme in Physics and Mathematics


Duration:4 years


Selection Process:  Academic qualifications and interview (also possible remotely)


Applicants from developing countries interested in participating in this selection must enrolled or hold an “ICTP Diploma in Condensed Matter Physics, High Energy Physics, Mathematics,  or Quantitative Life Sciences


Candidates from developing countries (with particular emphasis on students from the least developed regions of the world) are also welcome to apply if supported by a presentation letter from a member of the ICTP scientific staff.

item.title: Bando di ammissione al corso di PhD in Neurobiologia Selection for the admission to the Neurobiology PhD course
item.description:
Responsabile del Corso / Head of PhD course: Prof. Paul Heppenstall

From: 12-01-2023 13:00
To: 24-03-2023 13:00
Category: Dottorati

Avviso di selezione ad evidenza pubblica per ammissione al corso di PhD in Neurobiologia Selection for the admission to the Neurobiology PhD course - phd-neurobio-01-2023


Topics:


  • Peripheral Nervous System

  • Pain, touch and itch

  • Olfactory Systems and Ion Channels

  • Synaptic Neurophysiology and Neuronal Networks

  • Cell excitability and cortical information processing

  • Optogenetic and electrophysiological approaches to Neuronal Networks

  • Computational Neuroscience and Modelling

  • Bionanotechnology

  • Neurotoxicity and calcium signaling

  • New Materials and Neurons

  • Neurophysiology of Motor control

  • Spinal networks patho-physiology and locomotion

  • Interfaces to simultaneously stimulate and record signals from the spinal cord

  • Respiratory physiology

  • Neurophysiology and neuropharmacology of spinal motoneurons

  • Olfactory and taste dysfunctions in COVID-19

  • Visual systems and feature detection

  • Simultaneous acquisition of neural activity and behavior

  • Innate behaviors and their underlying circuits

  • Functional imaging approaches to neural circuits

Durata / Duration: 4 anni / 4 years


Modalità di selezione  / Selection Process:  Titoli  - orale (in presenza o da remoto) Academic qualifications - interview (in presence or remotely)

(19.04 – 20.04.2023)

item.title: Concorso per titoli ed esami per il conferimento di 6 borse di studio nell’ambito del Percorso Formativo Comune del corso di “Laurea Magistrale in Matematica” dell’Università di Trieste. – Anno Accademico 2023/24.
item.description:
From: 16-02-2023 13:00
To: 26-05-2023 13:00
Category: Borse di Studio

Link al bando


Istruzioni per la compilazione della domanda


Technical instructions for submitting selection's application


Requisiti: Laurea di primo livello in discipline scientifiche (o analogo titolo conseguito all'estero) entro il 31.12.2023


Calendario delle prove (in presenza presso la sede della SISSA di via Bonomea 265 - Trieste):

Prova Scritta: 07.06.2023 - ore 09.00

Prova Orale: 08.06.2023 - ore 09.00

L’esame di concorso è inteso ad accertare le conoscenze matematiche di base del candidato e la sua attitudine alla ricerca scientifica. Per la valutazione la Commissione dispone di 70 punti, di cui 10 per i titoli, 30 per la prova scritta e 30 per la prova orale.
